ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name != 'Data Loader Profile', RecordType.Name == 'Distributor GPP 3.0', Text(Accreditation_Type__c) == 'Product', OR( NOT(OR( Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Base', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Premier' ) ), NOT(OR( Text( Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Base', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Interim', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Premier', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Custom', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'NOT APPLICABLE', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = '' ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the following values are allowed: Base, Premier.
